Class ElementNode

java.lang.Object
ElementNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
IListOfBooks
public class ElementNode extends Object implements IListOfBooks
Represents a non-empty node in a recursive list of books. Each node stores one Book and a reference to the remaining part of the list.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    ElementNode(Book book, IListOfBooks rest)
    Constructs a new ElementNode with the given book and the rest of the list.

    • ElementNode

      public ElementNode(Book book, IListOfBooks rest)
      Constructs a new ElementNode with the given book and the rest of the list.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to be stored in this node.
      rest - the remainder of the recursive list.

  • Method Details

    • count

      public int count()
      Recursively counts the number of books in the list.
      Specified by:
      count in interface IListOfBooks
      Returns:
      1 (for this node) plus the count of the rest of the list.

    • totalPrice

      public float totalPrice()
      Recursively calculates the total price of all books in the list.
      Specified by:
      totalPrice in interface IListOfBooks
      Returns:
      the price of this node's book plus the total price of the rest.

    • allBefore

      public IListOfBooks allBefore(int year)
      Filters the list to return only books published before a specified year.
      Specified by:
      allBefore in interface IListOfBooks
      Parameters:
      year - the year to filter by.
      Returns:
      a new list containing books that satisfy the year condition.

    • addAtEnd

      public IListOfBooks addAtEnd(Book book)
      Appends a specified book to the end of this recursive list.
      Specified by:
      addAtEnd in interface IListOfBooks
      Parameters:
      book - the book to append.
      Returns:
      a new list with the book added at the very end.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Generates a string representation of all books in the list.
      Specified by:
      toString in interface IListOfBooks
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a formatted string of books, separated by spaces.
